summary: HI MY NAME IS [XXX]  AND MY HUSBAND AND I WERE IN A REAL BAD CAR ACCIDENT ON FEBRUARY 20,2015 AND MY DAD KEPT GETTING RECALL NOTICES BY EMAIL AND  BY  REGULAR MAIL AND MY HUSBAND AND I BOTH REALLY FEEL THAT THE AIRBAG CAUSED OUR INJURIES AND WE HAVE BEEN TOLD THERE IS  NOTHING  THAT CAN BE DONE BECAUSE OUR CAR ACCIDENT HAPPENED IN DENHAM SPRINGS, LA AND THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS AND MY HUSBAND AND I BOTH FEEL THAT THIS IS WRONG AND SOMETHING SHOULD BE DONE.  CONTACTED COMPLAINANT AND NO DEATH OCCURRED IN SV.  CORRECTED NUM. DEATHS TO "0".  HUSBAND [XXX] ALSO FILE VOQ IN 2016.  SEE [XXX] SGO FROM GM ON THIS CASE. ..UPDATED 09/28/17 *BF    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR *JS
